Include libraries and settings

```{r echo=FALSE}
source("graphs.R")
source("collect_experiments.R")
options( warn = -1 )
```

We get a list of links to experiments results:

```{r echo=FALSE}
GOOGLE_SPREADSHEET_URL <-"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DR4_TytGVSE-KyaZGiSpRmd8Ep-wMotK1JxPcPkNBXg/edit#gid=0"
experiments <- collectFromGoogleSpreadsheet(GOOGLE_SPREADSHEET_URL)
experiments$evaluation_url <- as.character(experiments$evaluation_url)
```

## Experiments:

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.keep='all',fig.width=18, fig.height=18}

title <- "empty"

for (i in 0:2){
	title <- experiments[i*3+1,"title"]
	print(paste("####",title, sep=" "))
	gr <- list()
	for (j in 0:2){
		index <- (i * 3) + j + 1

		experiment <- collectFromGoogleSpreadsheet(experiments[index,"evaluation_url"])
		experiment <- reformatExperimentData(experiment,experiments[index,"title"],experiments[index,"job_id"],experiments[index,"condition"])
		experiment <- filterEvaluation(experiment)
		gr[[j*3+1]] <- plotTimeline(experiment)
		gr[[j*3+2]] <- plotHistogram(experiment)
		gr[[j*3+3]] <- plotDotsDurationVSIndexAccuracy(experiment)
	}
	mp <- multiplot(plotlist = gr, cols = 3)
	print(mp)
}
```
